Reviews.Title: works well
Reviews.Author: Sandra A.
Reviews.Content: It worked very will, and easy to use, the sound and picture are very clear.  Great by for the money.

Reviews.Title: Good, but with problems
Reviews.Author: Kipchak
Reviews.Content: Pretty reliable and good recording, but it has a tendency to come apart easier than I'd like.  Also, there is a rattling sound sometimes when I'm using it that gets picked up on video.  It did come with extra pen ink inserts so that was nice.  Clip is pretty durable, but appears that it could bend or break at some point.  Fatter than I thought, but nearly everyone just thinks it's a pen.  Overall, four stars and I'd recommend.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: Robert K. Tucker "Navyolsalt"
Reviews.Content: Video quality is excellent! Easy to use. Easy set up on computer! Easy to do initial 4 hour charge on computer. Great for covert recording if ya get pulled over by police or recording if you are dealing with a dumb/rude store clerk, bank teller, ex-wife (LOL), meeting with doctor, etc. etc.  Only downside is battery is not replaceable but everything else so good I had to give it five stars!

Reviews.Title: Worked once.
Reviews.Author: Hixstead
Reviews.Content: I've never been more disappointed with an Amazon.com purchase.  The camera pen worked great -- once.  After that, it would freeze every time I tried to use it.  The worst part of it all is that you don't realize that it has stopped recording until you go to play back the video.  In my case, it completely destroyed the one opportunity I had to capture important covert video.  I reset the pen and attempted to use it for subsequent, less important, needs and encountered the same problem again and again.  Unfortunately, I didn't even remove the pen from it's packaging until 4 weeks after purchase and, by the time I encountered the issues, it was too late to return.  Yeah, I wasted $50 on a camera pen but that missed video opportunity was worth thousands.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Product for the price
Reviews.Author: M. Guzman "markymarc"
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, very durable and very impressed with the quality of the video for such a small and fairly inexpensive item.  Instruction manual was very easy to use. If you leave it recording it records in 30 minute intervals. Have to hold the record buttondown for about 4 to 5 seconds and then wait about another 4 to 5 seconds for it to start recording.Pros:  Video quality  Feels well constructed and durable  Instruction manual is easy to use  Writes well and has extra ink cartridges  Easy to hook up to computer with included USB cable  Long battery life and quick charging timeCons: Audio quality very poor  Much thicker than a normal pen  Long start time for recording

Reviews.Title: Much better models for similar prices
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for use in sales training.  Neither worked.  Bought a different product and it works great.  Gave them 2 stars because they took it back no problem.

Reviews.Title: Very cheaply made
Reviews.Author: cathy thompson "Shonan Mom"
Reviews.Content: This spy pen feels and looks flimsy.  It is large and clunky and because of its size it stands out.  You cannot really be very discreet with this,..haven`t been able to use it..

Reviews.Title: DOA
Reviews.Author: Greg Hindman
Reviews.Content: Didn't work.  The top part works as a USB stick but the camera portion never wanted to work for me.

Reviews.Title: Its okay
Reviews.Author: Ryan Rahman
Reviews.Content: I used to have a SWANN pen cam, which was great until It fell off of a 22 story building. I bought this as a replacement and the only thing wrong with it is that the camera is facing down. i used to be able to get a clear shot of a persons face and surroundings but you have to point the camera upward (not straight) to get the image that is in front of you. Waste of money

Reviews.Title: Be aware of malicious files
Reviews.Author: Mark Anvoots
Reviews.Content: After making a few videos I  hooked it up to my PC and I was immediately warned by my BitDefender AV program that there were issues with 2 included files, one a Virus the other Malware. BitDefender deleted the files without issue and I was able to view my recordings easily, directly from the Video directory on the pen... the first time.A few days later and after I rebooted my machine for an update, I put the pen in to view some new videos and the Video directory that was on the pen was gone, along with the Audio directory that was previously there. I tried to make a new Video directory and was told that a directory with that name already existed.  Only after typing in G:\Video\ in the explorer address bar was I able to see my videos.I have to do this every time now. Not a big deal and I could always just change the properties of the folders but after thinking about it, this is probably a good thing in case someone gets their hands on it, they won't know to type in the name of the folder to view the recordings.As far as video quality goes, I must have gotten a rare unit because my video quality is great for a camera lens the size of a pen tip. Audio is equally as good.  If you are looking for HD Video camera quality recordings, buy a real camera. If you want descrete  and reliable video and audio at the touch of a button than this is a great item.

Reviews.Title: Not working this is just a simple pen.
Reviews.Author: Sandeep Soni
Reviews.Content: I've tried many ways to on the camera but it didn't work, I don't think it has any camera they are fooling us. Don’t buy this.

Reviews.Title: You really get what you pay for...which isn't much
Reviews.Author: Gordon Ewasiuk
Reviews.Content: Let's set aside the instruction flyer with the English gibberish (see below) on it.  Let's set aside the fact that this supposedly new pen camera showed up with a video already on it.  Let's set aside the fact that box containing the pen was already opened when I received it...This camera just isn't very good...at all.  You can forget about full-motion video.  ANY movement results in a blurry or distorted picture.  Taking a snapshot requires tapping a button on top of the pen...which sorta defeats the point of having a HIDDEN camera.  Sound quality is atrocious.So, I have a "hidden camera" that can't take full-motion video, can't take snapshots without revealing the camera, can't record sound at anywhere near a decent level, and can't be turned off since the "English" instructions are nonsense.  For example:"Looks like the pen operating instructions to record""In closes down and under the readiness for action, presses the button short...""Long time according to button close down""This time allocates move set clock for pattern selection switch...""When is recording, if this fime electric quantity is insufficient...Save your money and buy something decent.  This pen cam is rubbish.PS:  The video showed the sweatshop where this rubbish pen cam was made.  You can see three Asians, a window, and two tables filled with these lousy pen cams.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed!
Reviews.Author: R. Mart "Gun Lover"
Reviews.Content: Since Night is a name brand, I expected a high quality product, instead I received the opposite. The camera did not work, the on/off button was very flimsy, and the directions were atrocious! There are much better products. This was the third pen I tried. I am glad I did not purchase their outside camera set.

Reviews.Title: Well for the Price
Reviews.Author: Average Joe "St. Mcflounder"
Reviews.Content: The quality of film ......excuse me....the digital recording is excellent. The drawback is the sound quality is a bit poor. That being said for the price of the product it is decent.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: M Diggy Mac
Reviews.Content: Video is great, audio is muffled and not great. Had for about a month and it broke in half. Glued together and still works.

Reviews.Title: OK but
Reviews.Author: Larry McNatt
Reviews.Content: Overall OK, but didn't like the way it was packaged and the instruction and information paper is so small, you need a magnifier to read the info. I plan on giving the item as a gift, so I have to find a box, etc to make it look as though it is a new item. The way it was packaged made it look like it had been used.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: C. Simonta-Dyer
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and he loved it! He reported it as great quality imaging, much better than he expected!

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: Vince Artalejo
Reviews.Content: Planning to return it when I get a chance. It did not work. I tried charging it several times but it would not record.

Reviews.Title: A Very Nice Value
Reviews.Author: night owl nopen-4gb-b
Reviews.Content: As far as overall value goes, this was a great product for the price. The video quality is quite good and the sound quality was far above what I expected.  It is user friendly for cavemen like me and also very simple to save videos for later reviews. I would like a longer lasting battery (always a complaint) and also I had trouble with the pen not wanting to write including the refills...but I wasn't purchasing this for the pen anyway. All in all im very pleased.

Reviews.Title: i dont like it
Reviews.Author: Myoe Khaing
Reviews.Content: I  can't use as a spy camera  @ night  coz  of green  flash light  & a little bit big, low version  in night.
